item.title: Making figures with TikZ/pgfplots for scientific publishing in Biology
item.description: I am a heavy user of matplotlib but secretly I am in love with tikz (well who isn’t!). I’ve been training myself with tikz and pgfplots for few years now, by drawing (umm.. coding) figures for labnotes, journal club and student’s seminars. ForÂ my recent paper published in eLife, I used tikz/pgfplots to draw all my figures and the results were awesome! [gallery ids=“2113,2114,2115,2116,2117,2118,2119,2120,2121” type=“rectangular”] The code and data used to generate these figures are available on my Github repository.
